title: AI Video Editor for Faceless YouTube Channel
job_overview:
We’re looking for a creative and reliable video editor to help us produce faceless YouTube videos and Shorts using AI tools. Most of the content will be AI-scripted, and your job will be to turn those scripts into clean, engaging videos using tools like RunwayML, CapCut, Pika, or similar.

If you’re familiar with voiceover tools like ElevenLabs, adding captions, and basic editing, that’s perfect.

What You’ll Do: 
- Edit long-form and short-form videos using AI tools
- Add voiceovers, captions, music, and visuals
- Optional: Create basic thumbnails and schedule uploads

Bonus: Help automate parts of the workflow (Zapier, N8N)

Requirements:
- Experience with tools like RunwayML, CapCut, Pika, etc.
- Can follow instructions and deliver consistent edits
- Familiar with faceless or AI-generated content
- Good English understanding (for instructions + reviews)

Bonus Skills:
- Thumbnail design
- YouTube scheduling & basic SEO
- Automation tools (Zapier, N8N)

How to Apply
Please send:
- 2 sample videos you edited using AI tools
- The tools you used
- Your rate (per video or hourly)

This is a part-time, remote role with long-term potential. If you're already editing this type of content, we’d love to see your work!
